name: Cargo + Go
description:
Quick (30 hours) little game I made for a game jam, using Phaser 3, Typescript, Clip Studio Paint, Logic Pro, and lots of roasted BBQ corn.

There are a couple of bugs remaining, and I might fix them soon:

  • 10x6 seems to be the only board size that works well right now
  • the polyomino grab/hit area is a bit off
  • the polyominoes can sometimes get lost in the background (same colour)
